body_html:
Nope. I applied the following:

-        previewSize =
-            chooseOptimalSize(map.getOutputSizes(SurfaceTexture.class),
-                inputSize, inputSize, largest);
+        previewSize = new Size(1920, 1080);

And then got this log:

Surface with size (w=1920, h=1080) and format 0x23 is not valid, size not in valid set: [1440x1080, 1280x720, 1056x864, 960x720, 720x480, 640x480, 320x240, 176x144]

And then get a Toast of "Failed"
Changing to new Size(1920, 1080) will create the Exception mentioned above.
Did I miss anything?

body:
Nope. I applied the following:
``` diff
-        previewSize =
-            chooseOptimalSize(map.getOutputSizes(SurfaceTexture.class),
-                inputSize, inputSize, largest);
+        previewSize = new Size(1920, 1080);
```
And then got this log:
> Surface with size (w=1920, h=1080) and format 0x23 is not valid, size not in valid set: [1440x1080, 1280x720, 1056x864, 960x720, 720x480, 640x480, 320x240, 176x144]

And then get a Toast of "Failed"
Changing to  new Size(1920, 1080) will create the Exception mentioned above.
Did I miss anything?
